short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super light chrome extesnsion to show all your open tabs in one click!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps in managing your tabs in chrome browser. Lets you find them easily with help of icon and webpage title. 

Features:
1. By clicking on any tab in the list you reach the desired open tab in browser.
2. Hovering on any tab shows a red coloured cross icon which allows to close that particular tab.
3. The search bar on top allows to search for an open web page with help of key words present in webpage title.
